sqlGroup.name: device.authbatch
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT mdb.id, mdb.devices, mdb.code, mdb.operator, mdb.dateline, mdb.status, mu.name AS operator_name -- @where FROM mo_device_auth_batch mdb INNER JOIN mo_user mu ON mu.id = mdb.operator WHERE operator = ? AND mdb.status != ? ORDER BY dateline DESC

SELECT mdb.id, mdb.devices, mdb.code, mdb.operator, mdb.dateline, mdb.status, mu.name AS operator_name -- @where FROM mo_device_auth_batch mdb INNER JOIN mo_user mu ON mu.id = mdb.operator WHERE mdb.status != ? ORDER BY dateline DESC
SELECT mdb.id, mdb.devices, mdb.code, mdb.operator, mdb.dateline, mdb.status, mu.name AS operator_name FROM mo_device_auth_batch mdb INNER JOIN mo_user mu ON mu.id = mdb.operator WHERE mdb.id = ?
